com.github.gwtd3.api.layout

Class Force.Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • com.github.gwtd3.api.layout.Node
        • com.github.gwtd3.api.layout.Force.Node
  • Enclosing class:
    Force

    public static class Force.Node
extends Node
    A node in d3j's force layout, see d3 docs on node. The node class is used in Force, The class provides accessors for the nodes key attributes, its position, previous position, fixed (immovable) and weight (number of links).
    Author:
    Vassilis Virvilis
